SourceString:
Welcome!
 Welcome to the beauty salon - Salon Felicia♪
 How will you look today?
<select>
Change appearance
Stop
<select_end><break>

Beauty salon - Salon Felicia is 
 always waiting for you. 
 Please come again ♪ 
<turn_end>

You want to change your appearance? 
 It costs {Gold} gold, 
 Is that okay? 
<yesno><break>
Oh? Looks like you don’t have enough money.\n<bw_break>
Do you want to change the style?\n<yesno_nc><break>

What should I do about the shape of your body?
<select_nc>
Adult
Children
<select_end><break>
Then imagine your new self and choose what you want to become.\n<break>
Oh? Are you going to quit?\n<yesno><break>
Oh? Now, it's the same as before! \n Can you please choose the appearance you want again? \n<bw_break>

Very nice. 
 I'm changing it to look like this. 
 Is that okay? 
<yesno><break>
Okay, leave it to me!\n I'll give you a nice makeover♪\n<bw_break>
Look! I got a perfect makeover. \n You look great♪\n<bw_break>

Ah, that’s a shame. 
 The beauty salon Salon Felicia is 
 always waiting for you. Please come again ♪ 
<turn_end>
